title-group.article-title: ON ELLIPTIC CURVES WHOSE CONDUCTOR IS A PRODUCT OF TWO PRIME POWERS

abstract.p: We find all elliptic curves defined over ℚ that have a rational point of order N, N ≥ 4, and whose conductor is of the form paqb, where p, q are two distinct primes and a, b are two positive integers. In particular, we prove that Szpiro's conjecture holds for these elliptic curves.
